description: Retention of existing detached garden outbuilding used as a gym and home office
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): 190WEL - 100 (LOCATION PLAN); 190WEL - 101 (FLOOR AND ROOF PLAN); 190WEL - 102 (ELEVATIONS); 190WEL - 200 (BLOCK PLAN)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes ancillary/incidental to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with Policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), Policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
